overview: Friend and supporter of Jesus Christ and his teachings, Mary Magdalene is an often misunderstood Biblical character. Was the first person to see Christ after his resurrection a lady of the evening, or was she a wealthy woman whose financial support played a key role in the survival of Christianity? This biography explores her life and, through ancient texts, art and research, attempts to disprove the possibility that she was a prostitute.
title: Mary Magdalene: The Hidden Apostle
